structure.unit: Chapter 8AA CABLE AND COMMUNICATIONS SERVICES PROVIDERS

text.section:
Sec. 8AA-68. Performance evaluation.
(a) The Director may conduct periodic performance evaluations of a licensee. A licensee shall cooperate with these evaluations. If the Director implements a survey of cable subscribers in connection with a performance evaluation, the Director may require a licensee to distribute the County's questionnaire to its subscribers at the County's expense. Upon request and upon reimbursement of County copying charges, the licensee may receive copies of all responses.
(b) At the conclusion of the evaluation, the Director shall issue a report of the results of any performance evaluation together with, if necessary, any recommendations for methods to improve a licensee's performance under the license or this chapter.
